post.text: Shooting deaths of police officers up 78% this year. We must restore law and order and protect our great law enforcement officers!

comment.author: Charles
comment.text: Get Sheriff David Clark into a strong position to get crime down in the Nation. Sheriff Clark has the knowledge of who needs to be removed off the streets and he has experience to do it. You need a Posse.

replies.author: Alexander
replies.text: Sheriff Joe and Sheriff Clarke, what a great team that would be

replies.author: Charles
replies.text: Also get the Vets on payroll. They need jobs and have training already. There's nothing better than having a strong united force protecting our Nation from within
